articles.author: Patrick Kariuki
articles.title: No, Elon Musk Is Not Buying [Insert Company Here]
articles.description: Elon Musk sometimes tweets to say he's planning to buy a company. But whether it's Coca-Cola or Manchester United, he (probably) isn't being serious.
articles.content: Despite being one of the world's richest (and presumably busiest) businesspeople, Elon Musk seems to spend a lot of time tweeting. And some of these tweets are him joking about buying random companie… [+2741 chars]
